title: International Registration Admin Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN Club or BOC user logs
custom_steps: WHEN user is in reporting widget
custom_expected:
THEN "International Registration Admin Report" report will be in the Report listing widget. Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
AND The category of this report should be "International". 
AND Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
AND The report will continue to use the existing LDAP. 
AND This is a BOC only report.

Report Layout: 
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3787608/International+Reg+Admin+-+Report+Layout

Report Details: 
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3787609/International+Reg+Admin+-+Report+Details

Report Logic: 
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3787606/International+Reg+Admin+-+Population+Logic+Sort+Considerations

Report Prompts: 
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3787607/International+Reg+Admin+-+Report+Prompts

Report Security: 
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3787585/International+Reg+Admin+-+Security+-+Frequency

title: CSP Detail by Club - Total Liability report
custom_steps:
Report Layout: 
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3781401/Club+Total+Liability+-+Report+Layout

Report Details: 
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3781373/Club+Total+Liability+-+Report+Details

Report Logic: 
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3781374/Club+Total+Liability+-+Population+Logic+Grouping+Sorting+Considerations

Report Prompts: 
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3781375/Club+Total+Liability+-+Prompts

Acceptance Criteria: 
* "CSP Detail by Club - Total Liability" is a report in the Report listing widget. Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
* Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements.  
* The report will have an LDAP associated with it. Please provide the LDAP when the story is delivered and a user id to test the report and security with.

title: 2+ Salary Arbitration "Super Two" Eligibility Report
custom_preconds:
Report Layout:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786001/EBIS4-TXT-5146+Report+Layout

Report Details:

Population, Logic, and Sorting:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3785998/EBIS4-TXT-5148+Population+Logic+and+Sort+Considerations

Prompts:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3785992/EBIS4-TXT-5150+Prompts

GIVEN a user is logged in as club or boc
AND user has navigated to Reporting Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks link for Super 2+ Arbitration Report
custom_expected:
THEN system should display prompts matching wiki documentation
AND selecting prompts and clicking ok should generate the Super 2+ Arbitration Report matching wiki report layout and details

title: Major League Contract
custom_preconds:
Report Wiki:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3783726/Complete+Contract+Major+Contracts

GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for printing an MJC
AND MJC has been saved at least once
AND "Print" button is visible on the MJC
custom_expected:
THEN system should allow the user to select whether they wish to Print Terms or Print Contract
AND selecting "Print Contract" will generate a pdf of the contract

title: Employee Contract
custom_preconds:
Report Wiki:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3777816/Employee+Contract

GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged with permissions to view the Employee Contract (UEC)
AND an employee has an exiting employee contract
AND user has navigated to the Contract tab
And click on the contract
custom_expected: THEN the system will download a pdf of the printed UEC.

title: Addendum D
custom_steps:
**Requirements (template, sample and details)**
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3773290/Addendum+D+-+Printing

**AC**
- Club and BOC users can hit the Print button on an Addendum D in any state to generate the printed PDF version
- If Add D is in edit mode and is not yet saved, save changes automatically when Print button is used
- The printed PDF should match the layout and specifications in the linked requirements. Note that the commissioners approval section is not part of the printed PDF since it is added on approval

**Note**
- The Parental guardian section should not print after investigation from #148854203

title: All Registered Players List
custom_steps:
Export report to pdf

Per wiki: "The report must not be downloadable to any other format other than pdf. "

title: Blank Letter to Potential MNFA
custom_steps:
Report Layout:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789130/Letter+to+Potential+MNFAs+-+Report+Layout

Acceptance Criteria:
* "Letter to Potential Minor League Free Agents" appears as an option in the Reporting widget under the Type "Blank Letters".
* Selecting this option will print the proper pdf of the letter.
* Users will have the ability to choose whether to print the letter in English or Spanish.
* The form will be generated in English if the language selected is English.
* The form will be generated in Spanish if the language selected is Spanish.
* The pdf will follow the provided format and details.
* LDAP used for security should be ebis-rpt-blank-letters.

title: Blank Minor League Life Insurance Form
custom_steps:
Report Layout:


Acceptance Criteria:
* "Minor League Life Insurance Form" appears as an option in the Reporting widget under the Type "Blank Letters".
* Selecting this option will print the proper pdf of the letter.
* Users will have the ability to choose whether to print the letter in English or Spanish.
* The form will be generated in English if the language selected is English.
* The form will be generated in Spanish if the language selected is Spanish.
* The pdf will follow the provided format and details.
* LDAP used for security should be ebis-rpt-blank-letters.
